body_html:
So there was a convention where gradients would return none (and not zero) if integers were involved. Then we changed some case for correctness. That happened maybe a couple of months ago. Do your computations involve integers?
…

body:
So there was a convention where gradients would return none (and not zero)
if integers were involved. Then we changed some case for correctness. That
happened maybe a couple of months ago. Do your computations involve
integers?

On Sun, Jun 10, 2018, 8:52 AM Rylan Schaeffer <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> anything is currently mentioned.
